note:
NTIZEZA is a platform for the support, education and celebration of femininities and feminist artists in Athens, Greece. NTIZEZA aims to increase the visibility of artists and projects focusing on feminist agendas, encourage collaborative structures, empower and celebrate young professionals and promote engagement with established ones.
The project is hosted at STOA FEXI project space in Omonia, central Athens. The light blue elevator is accessible and the space has an accessible toilet.
